DynamicProperty.name: Opacity
DynamicProperty.description: Amount to blend with the object's original color (0-255).

DynamicProperty.name: ShowAtOrigin
DynamicProperty.description: Set to true to show shape at Origin.

DynamicProperty.name: MakeAxisFrame
DynamicProperty.description: Set to true to make frame at Axis Position.

DynamicProperty.name: IsSelectable
DynamicProperty.description: Enable part to be selected in the Graphics window.

IOSignal.name: UpdateGraph
IOSignal.description: Set to high (1) to update the generated part when new values applied.

IOSignal.name: SyncToRAPID
IOSignal.description: Set to high (1) to update the RAPID code with current values.(Auto-resetted at end of Sync)
